task_prompt: 查看长春到北京的列车信息
send_prompt:
您对 Linux 操作系统非常熟悉。您的任务是操作计算机屏幕，完成指定的任务。
您现在的目标是操作计算机屏幕，视频宽度：1024，视频高度：768，总体目标是 "查看长春到北京的列车信息"。

我们为这个总体目标制定了一个实施计划：

    1. 双击打开'Firefox Web Browser'图标

    2. 在浏览器的地址栏中输入中国铁路客户服务中心或其他提供列车信息的网站URL

    3. 按Enter键加载网站

    4. 在网站的搜索栏中输入长春和北京

    5. 点击搜索按钮或按Enter键进行搜索


现在的子任务是 "在网站的搜索栏中输入长春和北京"。
您可以使用鼠标和键盘，可选择的操作有：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```
其中，鼠标的位置是相对于屏幕左上角的坐标，键盘的按键请参考 [keysymdef.h]。

请输出执行动作，请以 json 格式输出您的动作，例如：
我的计划是点击左下角的开始按钮，因此我的操作将是：
```json 
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":10,"height":760}}
]
```

另一个例子，我的计划是打开记事本，我看到屏幕上有Mousepad，因此我的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Super_L"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_text":"notepad"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Return"}
]
```


现在的子任务是 "在网站的搜索栏中输入长春和北京"，请根据现有屏幕图像的状态给出详细的下一步操作。
LLM_response:
根据这个屏幕截图，搜索栏看起来已经被激活并准备输入，因此我们可以假设不需要移动鼠标来点击搜索栏。下一个行动计划可以是使用键盘输入长春和北京。考虑到不可能提供精确位置的鼠标操作，这里是如何通过键盘动作实现目标的步骤：

```json
[
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text":"长春"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Tab"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text":"北京"}
]
```

以上JSON数组描述了将“长春”输入到出发城市搜索框的动作，然后按下“Tab”键移动到目的地城市搜索框，接着输入“北京”。这假设搜索框之间的“Tab”键切换已经正确设置并且用户界面上的下一个元素恰好是目的地城市的输入框。
LLM_response_editer:
根据这个屏幕所示，下一个行动计划可以是使用键盘输入长春和北京。考虑到不可能提供精确位置的鼠标操作，这里是如何通过键盘动作实现目标的步骤：

```json
[
{"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_position": {"width":269, "height": 363}, "mouse_button": "left"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text":"长春"},
     {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Tab"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text":"北京"}
]
```

以上JSON数组描述了将“长春”输入到出发城市搜索框的动作，接着输入“北京”。
task_prompt_en: Check the train information from Changchun to Beijing
task_prompt_zh: 查看长春到北京的列车信息
send_prompt_en:
You are familiar with the Linux operating system. Your task is to operate the computer screen and complete the specified task.
Your current goal is to operate the computer screen. The video width is 1024 and the video height is 768. The overall goal is to "view the train information from Changchun to Beijing".
We have formulated an implementation plan for this overall goal:
1. Double click to open the 'Firefox Web Browser' icon
2. Enter the URL of China Railway Customer Service Center or other website providing train information in the address bar of the browser
3. Press Enter to load the website
4. Enter Changchun and Beijing in the search column of the website
5. Click the search button or press Enter to search
Now the sub task is "input Changchun and Beijing in the search column of the website".
You can use the mouse and keyboard. The operations you can select are:```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```The position of the mouse is the coordinate relative to the upper left corner of the screen. For keyboard keys, see [keysymdef. h].
Please output the execution action. Please output your action in json format, for example:
My plan is to click the Start button at the bottom left corner, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 10, "height": 760}}
]
```Another example, my plan is to open notepad. I see Mousepad on the screen, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Super_L"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "notepad"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```The current sub task is "Enter Changchun and Beijing in the search bar of the website". Please give detailed next steps according to the status of the existing screen images.

您对 Linux 操作系统非常熟悉。您的任务是操作计算机屏幕，完成指定的任务。
您现在的目标是操作计算机屏幕，视频宽度：1024，视频高度：768，总体目标是 "查看长春到北京的列车信息"。

    3. 按Enter键加载网站

    4. 在网站的搜索栏中输入长春和北京

    5. 点击搜索按钮或按Enter键进行搜索

```json

    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},

    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},

另一个例子，我的计划是打开记事本，我看到屏幕上有Mousepad，因此我的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Super_L"},

]
```


现在的子任务是 "在网站的搜索栏中输入长春和北京"，请根据现有屏幕图像的状态给出详细的下一步操作。
LLM_response_editer_en:
According to this screen, the next action plan can be to use the keyboard to enter Changchun and Beijing. Considering that it is impossible to provide precise mouse operation, here are the steps to achieve the goal through keyboard actions:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 269, "height": 363}},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "\u957f\u6625"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Tab"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "\u5317\u4eac"}
]
```The above JSON array describes the action of entering "Changchun" into the departure city search box, and then entering "Beijing".
LLM_response_editer_zh:
根据这个屏幕所示，下一个行动计划可以是使用键盘输入长春和北京。考虑到不可能提供精确位置的鼠标操作，这里是如何通过键盘动作实现目标的步骤：

```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 269, "height": 363}},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "\u957f\u6625"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Tab"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "\u5317\u4eac"}
]
```

以上JSON数组描述了将“长春”输入到出发城市搜索框的动作，接着输入“北京”。
